title: Quantitative or Qualitative
text: We want to count the number of correct answers on a quiz. We can determine if this is qualitative or quantitative since qualitative data usually uses data while quantitative involves counting or measuring numerical values.

title: Quantitative or Qualitative
text: Is counting the number of correct answers on a quiz qualitative or quantitative data?

title: Continuous or Discrete
text: Look back to the hint about how discrete data deals with questions of the type "the number of". Is the number of classes you take per school year therefore discrete or continuous?
